Your privacy is important to Mahindra &: Your privacy is important to Mahindra & Mahindra Financial Services Limited (MMFSL)/ Mahindra Finance. This policy describes what type of information is collected, how the information is used, with whom the information is shared, and how the information is protected.
For the purposes of this Privacy Policy,: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy, the terms we, us and our refer to MMFSL/ Mahindra Finance. and/or our subsidiaries and affiliates. You, Your refers to you, as a user of our Services.
Please read this policy carefully to und: Please read this policy carefully to understand our policies and practices regarding your information and how we will treat it. If You do not agree with our policies and practices, Your choice is not to use our Services. By accessing or using our Services, You agree to this privacy policy. This policy may change from time to time, your continued use of our Services after we make changes is deemed to be acceptance of those changes, so please check the policy periodically for updates.
This policy applies to information colle: This policy applies to information collected by Mahindra Finance through the use of its mobile applications, which shall be downloaded before your loan is sanctioned by us.
WHAT TYPE OF INFORMATION IS COLLECTED?: WHAT TYPE OF INFORMATION IS COLLECTED?
Information Relevant to the Financial As: Information Relevant to the Financial Assistance provided by MMFSL
Pursuant to your request for financial a: Pursuant to your request for financial assistance to MMFSL/the financial assistance extended by MMFSL to You, and owing to insufficient credit history available on Your profile, We will collect information from your mobile device which will include your contacts, SMS, call history, location, browsing history, installed apps, calendar events, phone number, brand and model, Name, Home address, Guardians name (if minor), Email address, Domain address, Telephone number, Date of birth, Job position, Occupation, Company. No passwords will be collected by us.
User credential, or any information that: User credential, or any information that you submit to us. Other personal information we collect may include:
financial information such as income, as: financial information such as income, assets and your financial investment strategy and investment background
documents that you provide to us to veri: documents that you provide to us to verify your identity, such as copies of your passport, utility bills, and/or bank statement or your company incorporation details.
We may use cookies (If not selected may: We may use cookies (If not selected may affect certain or all functionalities), Web Beacons / Web bugs or other technologies to automatically collect certain information when You will use our
application. We may combine your informa: application. We may combine your information, automatically gathered information and the information we collect through cookies/web beacons / web bugs, including information that we have collected about you, or information that we have obtained from other sources.
We may aggregate any statistics or data: We may aggregate any statistics or data that are collected, but we are under no obligation to do so.
We may automatically collect certain non: We may automatically collect certain non-personal information from You such as Your browser type, operating system, software version, Internet Protocol (IP) address, General geographic location indicated by your IP address, Website that referred you to us, and similar information. We may also collect information about your use of the Site, including the date and time of access, the areas or pages that You visit, the number of times You return, and other Site usage data.
Cookies are small text files which a web: Cookies are small text files which a website may put on your computer or mobile device when You first visit a website or page. The cookie will help the website, or another website, to recognize your device the next time You visit. We use the term cookies in this policy to refer to all files that collect information in this way.
There are many functions cookies serve. For example, they can help us to remember your username and preferences, analyze how well our website is performing, or even allow us to recommend content we believe will be most relevant to You.
There are two broad categories of cookie: There are two broad categories of cookies:
First party cookies, served directly by: First party cookies, served directly by us to your device.
Third party cookies, which are served by: Third party cookies, which are served by a third party on our behalf.
Cookies can remain on your device for di: Cookies can remain on your device for different periods of time. Some cookies are session cookies, meaning that they exist only while your browser is open. These are deleted automatically once You close your browser. Other cookies are permanent cookies, meaning that they survive after your browser is closed. They can be used by the website to recognize your computer when You open your browser and browse the Internet again.
Once You download and install the Mahind: Once You download and install the Mahindra Finance application on your mobile handset, the said application will gain access to the relevant applications on your mobile device which will enable to application to collect the information (discussed above). By agreeing to this privacy policy after the installation of the app, You will allow us to collect the information mentioned above about You available on Your mobile device.
The information collected by us will be: The information collected by us will be used for the following purposes
Contacting You in response to a loan app: Contacting You in response to a loan application or otherwise
Research, addressing problems with, and: Research, addressing problems with, and improving the usage and operations of the services provided by us
Protecting the security or integrity of: Protecting the security or integrity of MMFSL.
Determining the customers eligibility fo: Determining the customers eligibility for our products and services
Developing credit risk models and perfor: Developing credit risk models and performing risk assessment
Verifying information that You have prov: Verifying information that You have provided
Gaining insights on your behavior patter: Gaining insights on your behavior patterns and interests
Providing, administering, improving and: Providing, administering, improving and developing our Services
Conducting statistical and market analys: Conducting statistical and market analysis and
Satisfying any other legitimate business: Satisfying any other legitimate business purposes, including handling any complaints and retaining information as necessary to meet our obligations under applicable laws and regulations.
Responding to your requests for our uniq: Responding to your requests for our unique products and services
To process your transactions and to prov: To process your transactions and to provide you with transaction and post transaction-related services, providing, improving, and marketing our products and services, including site content and performance
Evaluating your use of the services: Evaluating your use of the services
Providing advertising for products and s: Providing advertising for products and services that might interest you
Responding to your requests for informat: Responding to your requests for information
Communicating with you by e mail, postal: Communicating with you by e mail, postal mail or courier, and/or telephone about products or services that may be of interest to you
Maintaining and managing your account wi: Maintaining and managing your account with us
Keeping you updated on the issues that a: Keeping you updated on the issues that are relevant to your business relationship with us
Monitoring your compliance with any term: Monitoring your compliance with any terms and conditions associated with our products and services, including to confirm your identity
Performing other functions as described: Performing other functions as described to you at the time of collection or pursuant to your consent.
We may share personal information with o: We may share personal information with organizations or individuals that perform functions on our behalf. For example, service providers may process payments for our products and services or may store and process data on our behalf. These service providers are granted access to personal information for the purpose of performing their functions for Mahindra Finance.
Mahindra Finance may share collected per: Mahindra Finance may share collected personal information with group companies whose products and services we believe you may find of interest. If you would prefer that we not share your personal information with any third parties for the third parties marketing purposes, you can notify us of your preference by contacting us as described in the Contact Us section.
Mahindra Finance may share personal info: Mahindra Finance may share personal information in response to a court order, a request for cooperation from a law enforcement or other government agency, or as otherwise required by law to persons acting as representative capacity on your behalf to defend against legal claims to investigate, prevent, or take other action regarding illegal activity, suspected fraud, suspected violations of terms and conditions associated with any of our products or services, or other wrongdoing or to protect and defend the rights, property or safety of our company, our users, our employees, or others.

Mahindra Finance may share personal information in connection with a substantial corporate transaction, such as mergers, acquisition, the sale of our business, a divestiture, consolidation, or asset sale, or in the unlikely event of bankruptcy.
Mahindra Finance may share personal information as otherwise described to you at the point of collection or pursuant to your consent.
We take the security of your Information: We take the security of your Information very seriously and have implemented policies and procedures that are designed to help safeguard your Information from unauthorized access, use or modification including:
submitting information provided by You,: submitting information provided by You, through a secured transmission
restricting access to your Information o: restricting access to your Information only to those employees who are required to know such information in order provide our Services to You and
ensuring that all of our employees recei: ensuring that all of our employees receive appropriate training on all of our security procedures and conducting regular audits to verify compliance.
Mahindra Finance use commercially reason: Mahindra Finance use commercially reasonable security measures (including physical, electronic and procedural measures) to help safeguard personal information against loss, misuse, damage or modification and unauthorized access or disclosure. However, no system for transmitting or storing information electronically can be completely secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee that personal information or other communications will always remain secure
We do not knowingly collect personal inf: We do not knowingly collect personal information from minor children. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child who are in the minor category, we will delete that information from our database.
MMFSL shall retain the information provi: MMFSL shall retain the information provided by You for as long as required to close your loan account with us. We will also retain your information as necessary to comply with applicable legal obligations, to resolve disputes, and to enforce our agreements.
